verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H8661>Tartan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> when <S%H5623>Sargon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3898>him,<s%> and he fought against <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and took <S%H3920>it;<s%>

at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> and <S%H6605>loosen<s%> the <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> from off your <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and take your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> from <S%H2502>off<s%> your <S%H7272>feet.<s%>" He did <S%H6213>so,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> has <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H4159>wonder<s%> concerning <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and concerning <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%>

so the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> will lead <S%H5090>away<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H1546>exiles<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot,<s%> and with <S%H8357>buttocks<s%> <S%H2834>uncovered,<s%> to the <S%H6172>shame<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
They will be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H954>confounded,<s%> because of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> their <S%H4007>expectation,<s%> and of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> their <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this coast <S%H339>land<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3541><s%> 'Behold, this is our <S%H4007>expectation,<s%> where we <S%H5127>fled<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%> to be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> And <S%H4422>we,<s%> how will we escape?'"
